WFAPI::GtkFactory

WFAPI::GtkFactory Class Reference

#include <GtkFactory.h>

List of all members.

Static Public Member Functions

static MapLibAPI * createMapLib (DBufConnection *connection, DrawingContext *drawingContext, const MapLibInitialConfig &mapLibConfig)

Detailed Description

Collection of factory methods which are used to construct the Gtk-specific classes needed to initialize MapLib.

Member Function Documentation

static ImageSpec* WFAPI::GtkFactory::createGdkImageSpec ( GdkPixbuf *  gdkPixBuf  )  [static]

Creates an image object which can be used as backgrounds or icons for OverlayItems. Will increase the internal GTK reference count of the gdkPixBuf. It is therefore safe to remove a reference to the original pixbuf once allocated.

Initially the reference count of the ImageSpec resource is set to 1, so to properly deallocate it you will need to call removeReference() once you are done with the ImageSpec resouce.

Parameters:
gdkPixBuf The GdkPixBuf to use as source for the image.

static GtkDrawer* WFAPI::GtkFactory::createGtkDrawer ( GtkWidget *  widget  )  [static]

Creates a GTK based drawer using the supplied window. Note that by calling this function you assume ownership of the resource and it must be kept alive for the duration of the MapLib session.

Parameters:
widget The widget that the drawer should draw upon.
Returns:
The created GtkDrawer.

static MapLibNetworkContext* WFAPI::GtkFactory::createHTTPContext (  )  [static]

Creates and initializes a HTTP context which can be used by MapLib to download maps. Note that by calling this function you assume ownership of the resource and it must be kept alive for the duration of the MapLib session.

Returns:
The created MapLibNetworkContext.

static MapLibAPI* WFAPI::GtkFactory::createMapLib ( DBufConnection *  connection,
DrawingContext *  drawingContext,
const MapLibInitialConfig &  mapLibConfig 
) [static]

Creates an instance of MapLibAPI using the supplied connection, drawingContext and initial config. The DBufConnection to supply can either be retrieved from Nav2API or from GtkFactory::createHTTPContext().

Parameters:
connection The connection that MapLib will use.
drawingContext The drawing context that MapLib will use.
mapLibConfig The initial configuration for MapLib.
Returns:
A pointer to the MapLibAPI instance.
